summary: Three sisters who believe life is going to be easy, now that their parents are back together, until one sister falls in love with another's fiancé, and the youngest sister plays matchmaker.
cast: Deanna Durbin|Charles Winninger|Nan Grey|Helen Parrish|Robert Cummings|William Lundigan|Ernest Cossart|Nella Walker|Felix Bressart|Wade Boteler|Ralph Brooks|Jack Chefe|Charles Coleman|James Conaty|Frank Darien|William B. Davidson|Neal Dodd|Claire Du Brey|Eddie Dunn|Edward Earle|Bess Flowers|Mary Forbes|Jack George|Grace Goodall|William Gould|Thurston Hall|John Hamilton|Sam Harris|Winifred Harris|Howard Hickman|Kathleen Howard|Marjorie Kane|Edward Keane|Milton Kibbee|Doris Lloyd|Alphonse Martell|Bert Moorhouse|Edmund Mortimer|Jack Mulhall|Broderick O'Farrell|Charles Previn|Gerald Oliver Smith|Larry Steers|Grady Sutton|Mary Treen|Emmett Vogan|Russell Wade|Larry Wheat|Eric Wilton|Douglas Wood
title: Su última diablura
